com.xively

Class XiException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.xively.XiException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XiException.ConnectionException, XiException.ConnectionTimeoutException, XiException.NotConnectedException, XiException.XiMessageParserException

    public class XiException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This Exception type is the common parent of exceptions thrown by the APIs of the Xively SDK for Android.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XiException.ConnectionException
      Exception thrown by connection setup APIs.
      static class  XiException.ConnectionTimeoutException
      Exception thrown by connection setup APIs when a timeout occurs.
      static class  XiException.NotConnectedException
      Exception thrown when an operation requires an active network connection, however the connection is not alive.
      static class  XiException.XiMessageParserException
      Exception thrown by messaging APIs when invalid or corrupt data has been found.
